body:
As some of guys may know I am leaving for the week since I am going on a "educational trip" with my school to Québec. So I will be inactive for the rest of this week until next saturday :/ wish me luck and contact me on skype, here, youtube private messages if you guys live near tadoussac or the old Québec on thursday (we are going to a mall there... will give more info if you ask which mall)...


I don't know if the dorms we are staying in have public interwebs so I am saying goodbye for now <3

I will miss you all <3

title: leaving for the week

replies.body: I tried to get him :c sadly he lives 2 hours away from where I am going... unless he goes to his aunts house the day he finishes his exams (on wednesday) he won't be able to hang out with me :c I believe thursday is the only day possible to hang out xD, if not I WILL FIND HIM

You will enjoy that Vlad.
